/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents that add a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Above, the sky is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene, enhancing the colors and details of the cityscape.
